title: Crunchyroll Winter 2023 Simulcast Slate Offers Largest Line-Up Yet
description: The Crunchyroll Winter Simulcast 2023 slate is the biggest anime line-up yet, with TRIGUN STAMPEDE, VINLAND SAGA Season 2, and more!

title: Superman & Lois, James Gunn/DCU, Sandman & More: BCTV Daily Dispatch
description: In today's BCTV Daily Dispatch: James Gunn/DCU/Superman/Henry Cavill, Superman & Lois, SNL, The Sandman, The Nevers/#Westworld & tons more!

title: The Pitt Set the Blueprint in Nuanced Character Work With Only Four Episodes
description: The Pitt's character building is exceptional, but they set a particularly high bar with Abbot's character work in half the time. We discuss! The post The Pitt Set the Blueprint in Nuanced Character Work With Only Four Episodes appeared first on TV Fanatic.
author: Jasmine Blu

title: Doc’s Jon-Michael Ecker Plays Good and Bad Well, But He Plays This Best of All
description: Jon Ecker has excellent range, playing compelling baddies, and endearing good guys. But there's one role he plays far too well. We discuss! The post Doc’s Jon-Michael Ecker Plays Good and Bad Well, But He Plays This Best of All appeared first on TV Fanatic.
author: Jasmine Blu

title: Andor Star: My ‘Naive’ Season 2 Fear Was Wiped Away By an ‘All-Out Weird’ Dedra/Syril Storyline
description: The two halves of a rather odd couple each play important and distinct roles in Season 2 of Andor, the Rogue One: A Star Wars Story prequel series that returns Tuesday, April 22 at 9/8c (with weekly, 3-episode drops). Season 1 of the acclaimed drama built to a climax at the funeral for the titular […]
author: Matt Webb Mitovich

title: Casting News: Lucy Hale’s Netflix Series, Sheryl Crow and LeAnn Rimes Mentor The Voice and More
description: Pretty Little Liars vet Lucy Hale is taking on a double role as twin sisters in Dead Letters. The series adaptation of Caite Dolan-Leach’s novel is in development at Netflix, with Call Her Daddy host Alex Cooper’s company Unwell producing and Rachel Caris Love (Physical, Blindspot) penning the project, our sister site Deadline reports. author: Vlada Gelman
